related_configuration:
<module name="TreeWalker">
        <module name="Indentation">
            <property name="basicOffset" value="2"/>
            <property name="braceAdjustment" value="2"/>
            <property name="caseIndent" value="2"/>
            <property name="throwsIndent" value="4"/>
            <property name="lineWrappingIndentation" value="4"/>
            <property name="arrayInitIndent" value="2"/>
        </module>
    </module>
explanation: Checkstyle's Indentation check does not analyze whether multiple syntactically parallel elements—such as method parameters or array values—share the same indentation level. As a result, consistent indentation for parallel elements cannot be enforced.
